did.abstract: A balance sheet listing streets and other projects in Brooklyn and their monetary values or real estate values, debits, and credits. The total is $366,186.25. The document is signed by J.H. Paterson, Accountant. It is dated October 31, 1842.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.
